_header: Now harken every man both more and less
_description: St. Augustine on the Virtues of the Mass — fifteen couplets

BodRawPoe118.First Lines:
Here may euery man lern boþe more & lesseWhat mede it is
                    to here well þe messe …
BodRawPoe118.Last Lines:
…Oure sauyour to se þat we may com to þat holy
                    placeEuyrmore to se hym face to face

CamTCC601.First Lines:
Now herken euery man bothe more and lesseWhat mede ye receue to
                    here your messe…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu lord for thy myghtThow graunt vs grace to here
                    masse aryght
CamTCC601.Attributed Title:
Seynt Austyne noteth howe the Angell of heuen declaryd to hym the Merytes
                    of the Masse that men Receue in Heryng deuoutly a masse (f.
                    214v)
